tags: mandatory disclaimer: i'm a fandom newbie so if i get anything wrong please be gentle
summary: okay but i want to read an au where JJJ retires early or something and his son John is the one in charge of the Bugle things...
body:
okay but i want to read an au where JJJ retires early or something and his son John is the one in charge of the Bugle

things would be so much easier for peter if he didn’t have the bugle constantly tearing down spiderman’s reputation, and it would be nice if he had a steady pay from john so he didn’t have to constantly worry about rent and living expenses for him and may.

john is definitely smarter than his father though, so i feel like he’d figure out peter’s secret, but given what a reasonable man he is, he’d make a really powerful ally for peter to have.

summary:
You're pointing at me right now! Look at you! Look what you did there! Look at your finger right now!
You're pointing. I've been...
body:
You’re pointing at me right now! Look at you! Look what you did there! Look at your finger right now!

You’re pointing. I’ve been pointing at your pointing. It’s different than normal pointing.

You are pointing…

You haven’t seen pointing until I’m finished with you.

You’re accusing me of pointing while you’re…

My name is Dallas. 
I am 26, Leo Sun Sagittarius Rising and Cancer Moon, INFP. Chaotic Neutral. Ambivert. I am Aroace, Autistic and have Cerebral Palsy. Slytherin, Plague Rat, Inmate W25Z,  Swiftie. Gray Jedi. My blog is Multifandom, Social Justice, Doctor Who, Harry Potter, ASOIAF, Star Wars, Star Trek, Stranger Things, Life Is Strange, Orphan Black, Carmilla, WWE, Marvel, DC, LOTR, Buffy, Hannibal, Horror, Emilie Autumn, Taylor Swift, Halsey, Lorde, and other music and whatever I post!

summary: Spider-Man is not Iron Man’s sidekick, Spider-Man is not Iron Man’s yes man. Peter Parker’s inspiration is Ben and May Parker,...
body: Spider-Man is not Iron Man’s sidekick, Spider-Man is not Iron Man’s yes man. Peter Parker’s inspiration is Ben and May Parker, not Tony Stark. Spider-Man is not the next Iron Man, War Machine is. Peter Parker is not Tony Stark’s son, Peter is the son of Richard and Mary Parker, but his true parents are Ben and May Parker. Spider-Man is his own hero and Peter Parker is a genius who makes his own suits and web-shooters, he doesn’t need Stark tech. The focus of his story should BE about Spider-Man and the struggles of Peter Parker and not trying to impress or live up to Iron Man and not trying to BE the next Iron Man. We love Spider-Man for Spider-Man, not him becoming the next Iron Man. This Spider-Man/Iron Man dynamic singlehandedly helped sabotage the MCU Spider-Man. I said it before and I’ll say it again. Insomniac and Into The Spider-Verse understood what we wanted for the MCU’s Spider-Man better than the actual MCU

Spider-Man is his own hero and Peter Parker is a genius who makes his own suits and web-shooters, he doesn’t need Stark tech. The focus of his story should BE about Spider-Man and the struggles of Peter Parker and not trying to impress or live up to Iron Man and not trying to BE the next Iron Man. We love Spider-Man for Spider-Man, not him becoming the next Iron Man. This Spider-Man/Iron Man dynamic singlehandedly helped sabotage the MCU Spider-Man. I said it before and I’ll say it again. Insomniac and Into The Spider-Verse understood what we wanted for the MCU’s Spider-Man better than the actual MCU

summary: Peter's 18th Birthday - The Family AN: I decided to go on with my other imagine. 4 chapters should be enough, hope you like it....
body:
Peter’s 18th Birthday - The Family

AN: I decided to go on with my other imagine. 4 chapters should be enough, hope you like it.

CHAPTER 1- The Letter

•••••••••

Nobody had arrived. Everyone was in the backyard. Happy and Rhodey were starting the barbecue, sitting next to each other, talking and laughing while sharing a beer. Morgan was playing with some of her toys sitting in the grass and Peter was lying down in May’s lap, talking to her about the letter he received.

“I just wish he was here May. To celebrate this with us, to say a joke about my age, to talk improperly about my almost girlfriend who’s arriving soon. I really miss him.”

“I know my love, but sometimes we have to let things go when you can no longer hold the strings and it’s hurting you. Let Tony go, I know you loved him as much as he loved you, but he needs to rest peacefully now.”

“I guess you’re right.”

“Also, look at the family he gave you. He did what I tried to do your entire life and failed.”

“You didn’t failed aunty, you’re my family, no matter what. My blood.”

“I love you Parker. And you remind me so much of your uncle, he would be very proud of you.” She caressed his face and smiled softly.

“I love you too, May”

Pepper got out of the house holding a Mimosa jar and two glasses, one for her, one for May. She poured some of the liquid and they toasted.

“This is a great refreshment. And well, everything is ready, now we wait for the guests.”

“Thank you Mrs. Stark.”

“You’re welcome sweetie.”

Happy opened a bottle of beer and passed it to Peter, who did a really weird face and Happy rolled his eyes.

“You’re 18 kid, you can drink it.”

“I’m not 21 Mr. Happy.”

“Just do it, God…”

“May…” Peter asked and she laughed at the situation.

“It’s okay love, you can drink it.”

Peter took the bottle and drank a sip. He did a really weird face and it made Happy and Rhodey laugh at him.

“You’ll get used to it Pete.”

“I hope so.” He shaked his hand and took another sip.

“Happy! Can I drink it?”

“Not yet sweetheart, but if you want Coke or juice, I’ll get you some.”

“Don’t worry, here it is Mo.” Pepper gave her a small plastic cup full of grape juice, Morgan’s favourite.

“I wanna make a toast.” Peter said and everyone got up. “I lost my parents when I was very young, I lost my uncle way too soon. Everyone kept leaving me, but the only one who was always there and still is there every time I need, is you May. You’re my mom, you’ve always been. It was meant to be like this since day one. And I love you.” Peter said and May gave him a forehead kiss.

“I love you too darling”.

“One day a guy came to my house. Of course I knew him, he was very famous, and I was surprised that he knew who I was. He took me to Germany, gave me instructions and that’s when he started mentoring me. His name was Tony Stark, and he believed in me. He gave me everything I could need or possibly want to, whatever money could afford. Tony left too soon, and he didn’t even realize that he gave me the best thing in the world. Something money couldn’t afford. Happy was the first one I met, and he takes care of me, and I really appreciate it, very much.” He looked at Happy, who almost had tears in his eyes.“ I met Pepper when he was already gone, and just like May, she was my mother. She cherished me, made me feel as a part of the family. Look what she made for me today. And Rhodey, I lost Ben, but I met you, and I’m happy to call you uncle Rhodey. And so she came. He left me one more final gift. Morgan, you’re my sister, and as you said to me earlier, it’s real if you want to. You’re my amazing little girl, the smartest and the most amazing that I could ever ask for. Tony gave me something I’ve never really had, a family. May and I are really happy to call you family. This is a toast for us and for the amazing man Tony was. I wishhe was here, actually, I feel him standing next to me, hands on my shoulders and a smile. Thank you so much for this, Mr. Stark. I love you all very much.”

“To family… And Tony.” Rhodey said

“To family and Tony.” They toasted and hugged.

“I love you all very much.”

So everyone kept doing what they were doing. Morgan came to Peter and slightly pulled his pants to get Peter’s attention. Pepper came along with her.

“We have a gift for you Peter.” Pepper said. “Give it to him love.”

“Happy birthday Pete!” Morgan showed him a car’s key with the Stark Industries symbol on it.

“Mrs. Stark, I can’t accept that.”

“Yes, you can. And you should. Nobody’s using it and it’s simply there, please take it.”

“Thank you so much.” Peter gave her a kiss in the cheek and another one in Morgan’s forehead. “I love you both”.

He went to the garage to find the pretty black car just being there. Quietly and waiting. It’s electric, it has a manual and an automatic driver and can take you anywhere. Peter sat on the driver’s seat and closed the door.

“Hello Miss Potts, where to?”

“Hi F.R.I.D.A.Y., it’s Peter.”

“Hello Mr. Parker. Do you want me to set up Karen here for you?”

“That would be great, thank you.”

The car shut itself down and suddenly Karen was speaking instead. Peter smiled

“Hello Peter. Where to?” a female voice said.

“The front door please.”

So the automatic car started to walk and soon he was at the front door. It parked next to May’s car and shut down.

“Cool.” He got out of the car, and a girl was standing behind the car.

“Hello Pete!”

“Y/N!”

CHAPTER 1- The Letter

•••••••••

Morgan was playing with some of her toys sitting in the grass and Peter was lying down in May’s lap, talking to her about the letter he received.

So everyone kept doing what they were doing. Morgan came to Peter and slightly pulled his pants to get Peter’s attention. Pepper came along with her.

“Thank you so much.” Peter gave her a kiss in the cheek and another one in Morgan’s forehead. “I love you both”.

He went to the garage to find the pretty black car just being there. Quietly and waiting. It’s electric, it has a manual and an automatic driver and can take you anywhere. Peter sat on the driver’s seat and closed the door.

So the automatic car started to walk and soon he was at the front door. It parked next to May’s car and shut down.

Happy was the first one I met, and he takes care of me, and I really appreciate it, very much.” He looked at Happy, who almost had tears in his eyes.“ I met Pepper when he was already gone, and just like May, she was my mother. She cherished me, made me feel as a part of the family. Look what she made for me today. And Rhodey, I lost Ben, but I met you, and I’m happy to call you uncle Rhodey. And so she came. He left me one more final gift. Morgan, you’re my sister, and as you said to me earlier, it’s real if you want to. You’re my amazing little girl, the smartest and the most amazing that I could ever ask for. Tony gave me something I’ve never really had, a family. May and I are really happy to call you family. This is a toast for us and for the amazing man Tony was. I wishhe was here, actually, I feel him standing next to me, hands on my shoulders and a smile. Thank you so much for this, Mr. Stark. I love you all very much.”

“To family… And Tony.” Rhodey said

“To family and Tony.” They toasted and hugged.

“I love you all very much.”

So everyone kept doing what they were doing. Morgan came to Peter and slightly pulled his pants to get Peter’s attention. Pepper came along with her.

“We have a gift for you Peter.” Pepper said. “Give it to him love.”

“Happy birthday Pete!” Morgan showed him a car’s key with the Stark Industries symbol on it.

“Mrs. Stark, I can’t accept that.”

“Yes, you can. And you should. Nobody’s using it and it’s simply there, please take it.”

“Thank you so much.” Peter gave her a kiss in the cheek and another one in Morgan’s forehead. “I love you both”.

He went to the garage to find the pretty black car just being there. Quietly and waiting. It’s electric, it has a manual and an automatic driver and can take you anywhere. Peter sat on the driver’s seat and closed the door.

“Hello Miss Potts, where to?”

“Hi F.R.I.D.A.Y., it’s Peter.”

“Hello Mr. Parker. Do you want me to set up Karen here for you?”

“That would be great, thank you.”

The car shut itself down and suddenly Karen was speaking instead. Peter smiled

“Hello Peter. Where to?” a female voice said.

“The front door please.”

So the automatic car started to walk and soon he was at the front door. It parked next to May’s car and shut down.

“Cool.” He got out of the car, and a girl was standing behind the car.

“Hello Pete!”

“Y/N!”
trail.content:
Peter’s 18th Birthday - The Family

AN: I decided to go on with my other imagine. 4 chapters should be enough, hope you like it.

CHAPTER 1- The Letter

•••••••••

Nobody had arrived. Everyone was in the backyard. Happy and Rhodey were starting the barbecue, sitting next to each other, talking and laughing while sharing a beer. Morgan was playing with some of her toys sitting in the grass and Peter was lying down in May’s lap, talking to her about the letter he received.

“I just wish he was here May. To celebrate this with us, to say a joke about my age, to talk improperly about my almost girlfriend who’s arriving soon. I really miss him.”

“I know my love, but sometimes we have to let things go when you can no longer hold the strings and it’s hurting you. Let Tony go, I know you loved him as much as he loved you, but he needs to rest peacefully now.”

“I guess you’re right.”

“Also, look at the family he gave you. He did what I tried to do your entire life and failed.”

“You didn’t failed aunty, you’re my family, no matter what. My blood.”

“I love you Parker. And you remind me so much of your uncle, he would be very proud of you.” She caressed his face and smiled softly.

“I love you too, May”

Pepper got out of the house holding a Mimosa jar and two glasses, one for her, one for May. She poured some of the liquid and they toasted.

“This is a great refreshment. And well, everything is ready, now we wait for the guests.”

“Thank you Mrs. Stark.”

“You’re welcome sweetie.”

Happy opened a bottle of beer and passed it to Peter, who did a really weird face and Happy rolled his eyes.

“You’re 18 kid, you can drink it.”

“I’m not 21 Mr. Happy.”

“Just do it, God…”

“May…” Peter asked and she laughed at the situation.

“It’s okay love, you can drink it.”

Peter took the bottle and drank a sip. He did a really weird face and it made Happy and Rhodey laugh at him.

“You’ll get used to it Pete.”

“I hope so.” He shaked his hand and took another sip.

“Happy! Can I drink it?”

“Not yet sweetheart, but if you want Coke or juice, I’ll get you some.”

“Don’t worry, here it is Mo.” Pepper gave her a small plastic cup full of grape juice, Morgan’s favourite.

“I wanna make a toast.” Peter said and everyone got up. “I lost my parents when I was very young, I lost my uncle way too soon. Everyone kept leaving me, but the only one who was always there and still is there every time I need, is you May. You’re my mom, you’ve always been. It was meant to be like this since day one. And I love you.” Peter said and May gave him a forehead kiss.

“I love you too darling”.

“One day a guy came to my house. Of course I knew him, he was very famous, and I was surprised that he knew who I was. He took me to Germany, gave me instructions and that’s when he started mentoring me. His name was Tony Stark, and he believed in me. He gave me everything I could need or possibly want to, whatever money could afford. Tony left too soon, and he didn’t even realize that he gave me the best thing in the world. Something money couldn’t afford. Happy was the first one I met, and he takes care of me, and I really appreciate it, very much.” He looked at Happy, who almost had tears in his eyes.“ I met Pepper when he was already gone, and just like May, she was my mother. She cherished me, made me feel as a part of the family. Look what she made for me today. And Rhodey, I lost Ben, but I met you, and I’m happy to call you uncle Rhodey. And so she came. He left me one more final gift. Morgan, you’re my sister, and as you said to me earlier, it’s real if you want to. You’re my amazing little girl, the smartest and the most amazing that I could ever ask for. Tony gave me something I’ve never really had, a family. May and I are really happy to call you family. This is a toast for us and for the amazing man Tony was. I wishhe was here, actually, I feel him standing next to me, hands on my shoulders and a smile. Thank you so much for this, Mr. Stark. I love you all very much.”

“To family… And Tony.” Rhodey said

“To family and Tony.” They toasted and hugged.

“I love you all very much.”

So everyone kept doing what they were doing. Morgan came to Peter and slightly pulled his pants to get Peter’s attention. Pepper came along with her.

“We have a gift for you Peter.” Pepper said. “Give it to him love.”

“Happy birthday Pete!” Morgan showed him a car’s key with the Stark Industries symbol on it.

“Mrs. Stark, I can’t accept that.”

“Yes, you can. And you should. Nobody’s using it and it’s simply there, please take it.”

“Thank you so much.” Peter gave her a kiss in the cheek and another one in Morgan’s forehead. “I love you both”.

He went to the garage to find the pretty black car just being there. Quietly and waiting. It’s electric, it has a manual and an automatic driver and can take you anywhere. Peter sat on the driver’s seat and closed the door.

“Hello Miss Potts, where to?”

“Hi F.R.I.D.A.Y., it’s Peter.”

“Hello Mr. Parker. Do you want me to set up Karen here for you?”

“That would be great, thank you.”

The car shut itself down and suddenly Karen was speaking instead. Peter smiled

“Hello Peter. Where to?” a female voice said.

“The front door please.”

So the automatic car started to walk and soon he was at the front door. It parked next to May’s car and shut down.

“Cool.” He got out of the car, and a girl was standing behind the car.

“Hello Pete!”

“Y/N!”
